Teresa Okure (afọ iri asatọ) bụ onye nọn Katọlik nke Naijiria

Ọ bụ onye Afrịka mbụ ghọọrọ onye otu Society of the Holy Child Jesus. 
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ na Ngalaba Bible Theology, dị na Catholic Institute of West Africa, Port Harcourt, Nigeria. Okure n'akụzi Agba Ọhụrụ na Gender Hermeneutics, ma kuzikwa nkuzi na Institute kemgbe afọ 1999.
Ọ nwetara nzere dokita ya na Mahadum Fordham
N'afọ 2013, Popu Francis kwuru na ọ nwere ike ịbụ onye a ga-ahọpụta dịka nwanyị kadinal.
